clinical_study.brief_title: Convalescent Plasma Treatment in Severe 2009 H1N1 Infection
clinical_study.official_title: Convalescent Plasma Treatment in Patients With Severe 2009 H1N1 Infection: a Prospective Cohort Study

brief_summary.textblock: Treatment of severe 2009 H1N1 infection with convalescent plasma will reduce mortality.

detailed_description.textblock: Patients presented with severe 2009 H1N1 infection responded poorly to antiviral agents. Meta-analysis of reports from 1918 H1N1 pandemic suggested that convalescent plasma might be an effective treatment option for patients with severe 2009 H1N1 infection.
